Docs.param: Function to apply to each actitivty.
ChannelId to filter on or null for no filter.
ConversationId to filter on or null for no filter.
Docs.summary: Walk over recorded activities and call a function on them.
Docs.remarks: Activities are ordered by channel, then conversation, then time ascending.
